subject: College Athletics
Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Southern California’s Sam Cunningham — a black player who ran roughshod over the last all-white Alabama football team in his first collegiate game — was to be inducted into the college hall at the National Football Foundation’s award banquet.
snippet: Southern California’s Sam Cunningham — a black player who ran roughshod over the last all-white Alabama football team in his first collegiate game — was to be inducted into the college hall at the National Football Foundation’s award banquet.
